name: 2021 5th International Conference on Digital Signal Processing（ICDSP 2021）
content: Publication： All papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM(ISBN: 978-1-4503-8936-5), which will be archived in ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
